heading: HR00236
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH AND COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE POLICY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH PROHIBITING DELIVERIES ASSISTED BY TRADITIONAL BIRTH ATTENDANTS (TBA) DUBBED AS THE 'NO HOME-BIRTHING POLICY' AND THE SUBSEQUENT ISSUANCE OF MUNICIPAL AND CITY ORDINANCES OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE SAID POLICY, AND RECOMMEND MEASURES THAT WOULD TRULY ADDRESS THE HIGH MATERNAL AND INFANT MORTALITY RATES IN THE COUNTRY WITHOUT VIOLATING THE RIGHTS OF MOTHERS
principal-authors: DE JESUS, EMMI A.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.;
status: Pending with the Committee on WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY since 2016-09-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00236
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH AND COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE POLICY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH PROHIBITING DELIVERIES ASSISTED BY TRADITIONAL BIRTH ATTENDANTS (TBA) DUBBED AS THE 'NO HOME-BIRTHING POLICY' AND THE SUBSEQUENT ISSUANCE OF MUNICIPAL AND CITY ORDINANCES OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE SAID POLICY, AND RECOMMEND MEASURES THAT WOULD TRULY ADDRESS THE HIGH MATERNAL AND INFANT MORTALITY RATES IN THE COUNTRY WITHOUT VIOLATING THE RIGHTS OF MOTHERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DE JESUS, EMMI A., BROSAS, ARLENE D., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., TINIO, ANTONIO L., CASTRO, FRANCE L., CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY ON 2016-09-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-23;
